revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Tzamoul, son of Victor, on account of the poll-tax, 1 person, 1 for the poll-tax assessment; 3/ Athanasius, son of Cosmas, and his son, 1 person, 1 etc.; [[.]]/ Senuthius, son of Cosmas, 1 person, 1 etc.; [[.]]// Theodosius, son of Joseph, 1 person, 2/3 etc.; [[.]]// Musaeus, son of Colluthus, 1 person, 2/3 etc.; [[.]]/ Pecysius, son of Calide, 1 person, 2/3 etc.; 6// Pelole, son of Cerbous, 1 person, 2/3 etc.; [[.]]// Sourous, son of Pecysius, 1 person, 2/3; [[.]]// Cyrillus, son of Hermaos, 1 person, 2/3 etc.; [[.]]// Pecysius, son of Colluthus, 1 person, 2/3 etc.; Elias, son of Pharau, 1 person, 2 .; Psatus (?), son of Tzamoul, and son, 1 person, 1 etc.; Victor, son of Mark, the shepherd, 1 person, 2/3 etc.; Pisatus, son of Pescoul, 1 person, 2/3 etc.; Senuthius, son of Zacharias, and his son, 1 person, 1 etc.; Stephanus, son of Parnates, 1 person [, Menas, son of Apollo, 1 person [
